content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hi Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that you are a student. Therefore, I can offer you a price of 600 Euro for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is too low for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a better offer, but I'm sure you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While it's getting closer to my expectations, I still believe you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I'm sorry, but I cannot go any higher than 800 Euro. 

[yourname], if you don't want to continue the negotiation, please say: 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If you and I have agreed on a price, please say 'TERMINATE'. If neither of these conditions are met, please keep negotiating.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
